ProductInfo.Features:
D1 Real-time Recording & Playback. Recording D1 720x480 resolution at 7 Frame Per Second on each channel or Half D1 720x240 at 15 FPS or CIF 360x240 at 30 FPS on each channel
Support UPnP, No port-forwarding is needed
DVR Motion detection triggered events can be promptly notified by loud audible alert and / or Email notifications to PCs or smart phones
Configurable per channel, Surveillance Signal Loss, Motion Trigger, Audible Alarm, Alert Durations, Recording Log Management
Live view and access control through Internet Explorer, Firefox, Chrome, and Mac OSX/safari. Streaming live video on mobile smart phone via free app
